about_the_game:
Enter the world of We Were Here with the original soundtrack. You get 9 beautifully composed and produced soundtracks by the talented Leon van der Stel. By buying this soundtrack bundle you are also directly supporting the artist and the development of the We Were Here games!

Includes all music heard in We Were Here plus a sound fx track.
BONUS: First ambient track of We Were Here Too.

Track list:
  • We Were Here - Main Theme
  • We Were Here - Is That a…
  • We Were Here - The Water Rises
  • We Were Here - Together Alone
  • We Were Here - Curtain Call
  • We Were Here - Trailer
  • We Were Here - Trailer with Voice Over
  • We Were Here - FX You may have missed
  • We Were Here Too - Bonus track Tombs and Coffins

Total running time: 26:49
